tensorflow.python.framework.errors.InvalidArgumentError: Cannot assign a device to node 'b': Could not satisfy explicit device specification '/device:KPU:0' because no supported kernel for KPU devices is available.

I think I will make them variables because I need to do that anyway. How do I fix,

```
tensorflow.python.framework.errors.InvalidArgumentError: Cannot assign a device to node 'b': Could not satisfy explicit device specification '/device:KPU:0' because no supported kernel for KPU devices is available.
